page.title: 10WOODLAWN SPECIAL SCHOOL
page.content: I attended Woodlawn Special School before I came to South Wellfield First Shool in September 1984.Woodlawn is for physically handicapped children.Most of friends were in wheelchairs.Melanie couldn't use her legs or arms.She wrote with a pencil in her mouth.In the mornings we did normal schoolwork.At dinnertime the nannies and teachers helped children to cut up their food.Some children had special diet meals.In the afternoons we had Art, stories,played games or went out in the mini-bus.We went to Fenwick's department store in Newcastle to see Santa Claus.Sometimes soft toy equipment was brought to school for us to play on.I was in The Wizard of Oz as the good witch and I sang "Somewhere Over the Rainbow."
